title: UFO Disclosure - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/11/19
itunes:title: UFO Disclosure - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/11/19
description:
George Noory and British UFO investigator Nick Pope explore efforts by the United States and British military to update rules about reporting UFO sightings, why the media is now treating UFO cases more seriously, and whether these could be secret Russian or Chinese aircraft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
George Noory and British UFO investigator Nick Pope explore efforts by the United States and British military to update rules about reporting UFO sightings, why the media is now treating UFO cases more seriously, and whether these could be secret Russian or Chinese aircraft.

itunes:summary: A former British military investigator discusses his push to find the truth about UFOs.
